```{r data, include=FALSE}
top <- read_csv("billboard.csv") |>
  select(date = "Date",
         song = "Song",
         artist = "Artist")
```

```{r}
modern <- top |>
  filter(date >= "1980-01-01")
```

```{r}
artists <- modern |>
  count(artist) |>
  arrange(-n) |>
  filter(! artist %in% c("Soundtrack", "Various Artists"))
```
